page.title: 09Clubs:-Morris Dancing
page.content: Morris dancing has been going on at Carn Brea for many years. I joined the Morris Men when I was only two.On my 4th birthday I actually danced.I have progressed steadily.Morris dancing is not a thing you can easily forget. I am now just starting to play for them. We practice every Monday from 7.00 until 8.00 and we do about 20 different dances.We have 3 musicians, 2 accordians and 1 melodian. Our costume is a white shirt, blue knee-length trousers,white socks,bells and red and yellow balldricks (crossed sashes).Each dance lasts about 15 minutes.Children can go from 7 to 8 p.m.and adults from 7 to 9 p.m.
